==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Secaille is a Meropide [[guard]]. She helps the Traveler uncover the scheme involving the [[Beret Society]]. She also comforts [[Eclancher]] to help her recover after her traumatizing experience with the [[Aqua Doloris]]. Secaille is met in the domain [[Dougier's "Kingdom"]] along with Eclancher and helps evacuate and rescue the people there.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|It's What He Deserves}}</ref>

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
Secaille has blue hair and green eyes and wears the black uniform of the Meropide guards.
